welcome.title: Welcome to ShreeRampur
welcome.subtitle: A model village committed to sustainable development and prosperity

history.title: Our Village History
history.p1: ShreeRampur has a rich history dating back to the 18th century. Named after Lord Ram, the village was established by freedom fighters who sought refuge in this serene location during India's struggle for independence.
history.p2: Over the years, ShreeRampur has transformed from a small agricultural settlement into a progressive rural community while preserving its cultural heritage and traditions.
history.p3: Today, our village is known for its agricultural prosperity, cultural richness, and community harmony, making it a model village in the district.

demographics.title: Village Demographics
demographics.subtitle: A snapshot of our diverse and vibrant community

panchayat.title: Meet Our Gram Panchayat
panchayat.subtitle: Dedicated leaders working for the village development

achievements.title: Village Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Recognitions and milestones that make us proud

2023.title: State-level Clean Village Award
2023.description: Recognized for exemplary waste management and sanitation practices.

2022.title: 100% Digital Literacy
2022.description: Achieved digital literacy for all residents between the ages of 14-60 years.

2021.title: Water Conservation Model Village
2021.description: Implemented innovative water harvesting and conservation techniques.

2020.title: Open Defecation Free Status
2020.description: Successfully achieved and maintained ODF status with 100% toilet coverage.

2018.title: Solar Energy Adoption
2018.description: First village in the district to adopt solar energy for street lighting and public facilities.

slide1.title: Welcome to ShreeRampur
slide1.subtitle: A model village committed to sustainable development and prosperity

home.welcomeParagraph1: ShreeRampur is a vibrant village located in the heart of rural Maharashtra, where tradition meets progress. Our Gram Panchayat is committed to the sustainable development of our village and the welfare of our residents.
home.welcomeParagraph2: Under the visionary leadership of our Sarpanch and dedicated Panchayat members, we are working tirelessly to transform ShreeRampur into a model village with modern amenities while preserving our rich cultural heritage.
home.emergencySubtitle: 24/7 Emergency assistance for our village residents
home.ambulanceDetails: 24/7 ambulance service with advanced life support
home.eventsSubtitle: Stay updated with the latest happenings in our village
home.ctaSubtitle: We're here to serve you. Reach out to us with your queries or feedback.
